QuestData.Title: Gizmos and Gadgets
QuestData.Description: I've been coming up short on parts recently for my engineering projects, and the other day I finally saw why: the Mosshide gnolls have been making off with them!$B$BI don't have any idea what they could possibly want them for, but I need those gizmos back. They're probably strewn all over the marsh by now, but if you see any, could you gather them and bring them back?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, wonderful! I'll be able to start reassembling these right away. Thank you so much!
